title: Convince Me...
body:
try to convince me to ship {{champion:89}} and {{champion:131}} 

http://media.moddb.com/cache/images/groups/1/3/2055/thumb_620x2000/f855c8cbc427469e0901c0e6aad4f6b5.jpg

replies.body:
because couples should complete theirselves

you have moon
you have sun

https://imgflip.com/readImage?iid=19849663
"Theirselves" https://i.ytimg.com/vi/DBg-ckMsGxU/hqdefault.jpg

it was on purpose in order to accentuate the complementarity 


http://memesvault.com/wp-content/uploads/Facepalm-Meme-04.png

the really funny thing is that the sun has no moons, as a moon can only be something that is orbiting a planet, were it orbiting a star it would be called a planet.

Specifically what I'm saying is that there is a love triangle where leona likes malphite but malphite likes diana and diana is really into leo, but leo doesn't like diana much.
Shouldn't Diana be into Malphite too then?
Malphite's a rock.

> [{quoted}](name=ZeusHasRefresher,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=o1NpxAxE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-19T00:05:50.816+0000)

Maybe we need a Taliyah x Leona x Diana threesome?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Taliyah x Leona x Diana x Aurelion Sol. You can't forget the galaxy.

> [{quoted}](name=Goddess Madoka,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=o1NpxAxE,comment-id=00020001000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-19T07:40:56.003+0000)
>
> Taliyah x Leona x Diana x Aurelion Sol x Yorick. You can't forget Yorick.


Ftfy.
where is jupiter?
i miss pluto
where is uranus?
{{champion:136}} That moment you realize you both worship the same light just in different ways. Typical Targon redundancy.
Because, the courtship of the sun and the moon will form the bond needed for the night and day to coexist in complete harmony
harmony was already around before Diana destroyed it by killing the elders.

There is no harmony without balance... The elders harmony was FALSE! 

The world cannot exist with just the sun OR the moon

United, the world is harmonized and balanced

you dare question the elders? That sounds something a heretic would say! Balance had been preserved far before Diana lifted her blade against the solari, she is not only a heretic, but a traitor as well.

They were going to kill Diana just for questioning their beliefs.

She brought physical proof of the Lunari, and they denied it. 

She was not branded a heretic because she was a traitor, but because your elders were to prideful to accept they were wrong. 

And they deserved to die for their oppressive ways

Given the chance I would have pointed Shaco in there direction, sure he would have enjoyed the old blood on his blade.

you make decent points but it still does not justify Diana's actions. Leona too, was once herself turned upon by her kin, but when she was chosen to be the sun's avatar, the solar flare that was unleashed STUNNED her attackers, while Diana simply went on a rampage destroying the temple and killing anyone that got in her way.

Natural instinct kicked in, Kill or Be Killed

In the new lore she didn't realize what she had done until it was too late

Ohhh....
that's why lunar eclipses happen

The Sun must set before there can be a New Nawn.

To truly appreciate the sun, you must spend time with out its presence. 

 It is darkest just before dawn. 

For in total darkness the brilliance of the Sun is at its most radiant. 

The Moon has a secret.

The light it shines is borrowed from the Sun, as both want you to move forward in life.

At night you still have a guide.

The Moon is that guide that leads you to the New Dawn

The Brilliance of Leona is enhanced by what Diana brings, and the subtle beauty of Diana can be seen because of the light that Leona brings.
"Nawn" https://i.ytimg.com/vi/DBg-ckMsGxU/hqdefault.jpg
Ain't nobody got time for that
